{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:09.319

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:12.319
    | text      = What's your bright spot today, buddy? I guess, you know what?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:14.319
    | text      = This isn't so much... I don't know if this is a bright spot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:16.319
    | text      = Or whatever. But we had a tornado warning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:19.319
    | text      = We did. Yesterday, as we're recording this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:21.319
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:22.319
    | text      = And, I mean, it was a little exciting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:25.319
    | text      = You know, it kind of broke up the day a little bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:28.319
    | text      = It was the second tornado warning I think I've heard in Chicago.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:32.319
    | text      = No, more than that. Really?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:34.319
    | text      = Yeah. Well, do you mean like in the last year?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:36.319
    | text      = No, no, no. I mean, like, warning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:38.319
    | text      = Not like the watch thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:40.319
    | text      = I can think of three times in the last, like, two years that I've gone down to the laundry room.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:46.319
    | text      = Really?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:47.319
    | text      = Yeah. Because of sirens.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:49.319
    | text      = Holy cow.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:50.319
    | text      = And I know that in the years living in Chicago before that, that it never happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:55.319
    | text      = None. Zero. Zero times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:01:57.319
    | text      = It is very much happening more that tornadoes are spotted near the city area.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:05.319
    | text      = I don't know. I mean, I don't think it's a bright spot because, you know, tornadoes are really devastating.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:12.319
    | text      = And when they hit, they hurt a lot of people and I don't want to celebrate that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:17.319
    | text      = But there is something that kind of takes me back to when I was a kid and we'd go down to the basement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:23.319
    | text      = And, you know, there'd be like, it almost felt like we were hiding out and there were snacks in the basement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:28.319
    | text      = It was kind of like, I don't know, there's something...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:30.319
    | text      = Candles because the power might go off. Yeah, the whole thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:33.319
    | text      = There's something, a crank radio.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:36.319
    | text      = Oh, man. The old times.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:38.319
    | text      = There's something that's kind of, it harkens to a more innocent time, an easier time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:43.319
    | text      = And I don't know why that's evoked by a tornado warning, but it kind of is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:47.319
    | text      = I think that this is something that a lot of Midwestern people who grow up in like rural Midwest really share because tornadoes were so much more frequent.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:02:57.319
    | text      = And like a much more present threat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:00.319
    | text      = Yeah, totally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:01.319
    | text      = Like the odds of it hitting, the memories of one hitting, you know, that, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:05.319
    | text      = Yeah. And at the same time, there was an element of like, I'm used to the tornadoes going off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:12.319
    | text      = And so there was much more comfort in being like, well, let's take a look at that tornado before we go down to the basement, you know?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:18.319
    | text      = Let's step outside. Holy shit. And then you go right back into the basement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:21.319
    | text      = Yeah. And maybe I've talked about this a little bit before in the past, but it also is something that like is a fear that I overcame.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:28.319
    | text      = Like growing up in places like Hawaii, like there weren't thunderstorms there really.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:35.319
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:36.319
    | text      = And tornadoes and stuff. So like when I moved to Missouri, it was something that I was preoccupied with killing me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:42.319
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:43.319
    | text      = Like I was sure that we were moving to tornado alley.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:46.319
    | text      = Like you knew in advance before you moved.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:48.319
    | text      = Oh shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:49.319
    | text      = Yeah. I don't know. I'd read some book or something like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:52.319
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:53.319
    | text      = And it terrified me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:54.319
    | text      = Fucking books.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:03:55.319
    | text      = Like one of the first days we were in Missouri, you know, terrible thunderstorm. And I was, you know, horrified.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:01.319
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:02.319
    | text      = And then over the course of it, realizing, you know, like you can go to the basement. There are things that you can do that can make you more safe.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:09.319
    | text      = I think it's one of the fears that I've been able to overcome.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:13.319
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:14.319
    | text      = And it fucking drives me nuts to see like nobody does anything in Chicago.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:20.319
    | text      = No. No, no, no, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:21.319
    | text      = No one cares at all.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:22.319
    | text      = No. We're going to die.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:23.319
    | text      = There's a tornado warning and people are just like, I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:26.319
    | text      = What are you going to do? We're in buildings everywhere. Something's going to fall on you. A basement's not going to save you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:32.319
    | text      = Yes, but it will be significantly better if a tornado hits and you're in a basement.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:37.319
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:38.319
    | text      = Than if you're on the third, fourth, fifth floor of something.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:40.319
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:41.319
    | text      = And there's a laundry room. Everybody could go down there. I was the only person in the laundry room.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:46.319
    | text      = Here's the thing though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:48.319
    | text      = I'm poking my head out. I'm seeing just people walking their dog like, what the fuck is going on? There's a tornado warning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:04:54.319
    | text      = I have way more fear of being trapped in a basement underneath rubble than I do of being hit by a tornado.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:00.319
    | text      = Azar, that's not what's going to happen to you.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:02.319

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:04.319
    | text      = But if you do, you'd be so thankful to be trapped under some rubble.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:09.319

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:21.319
    | text      = Yeah, exactly. You're going to Oz, my man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:25.319

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:28.319
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:29.319
    | text      = So anyway, I don't know. It was just a little bit exciting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:05:31.319
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:05.319

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:06:09.319

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:43.319
    | text      = I imagine it helps undo a little bit of the tennis soreness and what have you, so it's a good dual thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:52.319

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:00.319
    | text      = Well, here's the thing. I realized after the fact that when we said we're going to Scotland at Glasgow,
}}
